title: SLFP MPs to call on President
body_lines: The fourteen Members of Parliament representing the Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP) are scheduled to meet President Gotabaya Rajapaksa at 4.00 p.m. this evening (April 05).
Earlier today, SLFP chairman and former President Maithripala Sirisena told the House that the SLFP lawmakers would represent themselves in the parliament independently from thereon.
In the meantime, more than 25 other MPs of the SLPP and other government-affiliated political parties including Wimal Weerawansa, Udaya Gammanpila, Vasudeva Nanayakkara
